special_text:
Whenever a player discards one or more cards, put a loyalty counter on An Uninvited Guest.
[+1]: Create a 1/1 green Elemental creature token.
[-3]: Destroy target creature or planeswalker. Target player mills three cards.
[-7]: Return target creature card from a graveyard to the battlefield under your control. If its mana value is 4 or less, put three +1/+1 counters on it.
